Package org.apache.wiki.http.filter

Class CsrfProtectionFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.wiki.http.filter.CsrfProtectionFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.servlet.Filter
    public class CsrfProtectionFilter
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.servlet.Filter
    CSRF protection Filter which uses the synchronizer token pattern â€“ an anti-CSRF token is created and stored in the user session and in a hidden field on subsequent form submits. At every submit the server checks the token from the session matches the one submitted from the form.
